nodes.bodyText: Would not it be just enough to increase the wait time in the system property?

It would, but we've also used this approach in quite a number of places too so I think either would work so I can change it however you'd prefer.  Would you prefer I adjust the property used by the Travis CI yaml?
My bad, you are right, this is a special case only so it makes sense to multiply it by a constant. When CI completes the PR can be merged.
